user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable and reliable underwear that could accommodate my active lifestyle while also being cost-effective.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a more affordable replacement for a high-end product I previously purchased. However, the fit and comfort of this product did not meet my expectations, leading me to feel disappointed and ultimately decide to stick with the more expensive option.

I needed reliable underwear that could withstand my active lifestyle, particularly while walking the golf course. The combination of comfort, performance, and price made this product appealing, and my previous experiences with various brands helped me make a confident choice.

I was looking for high-quality underwear that offered comfort and durability. The product's features, such as cooling channels and a comfortable waistband, aligned perfectly with my needs, and the positive reviews reinforced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer high-quality, well-fitting clothing that is comfortable and durable, especially for activities like golfing. I value products that offer good material and construction, as well as consistent sizing that simplifies the shopping experience. I appreciate items that perform well under physical activity and provide flexibility, such as shorts and pants with stretch features. Additionally, I tend to favor brands that have proven reliability and positive experiences in the past. On the other hand, I dislike products that do not meet my expectations in terms of fit and comfort, particularly in underwear, where I have a low tolerance for discomfort. I also find poor value for money and subpar quality unappealing, especially when it comes to everyday essentials.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and reliable underwear that can keep up with my active lifestyle without breaking the bank. within my expected price range: [23.98, 25.54]
What specific features or materials are important to you in terms of comfort and reliability when it comes to underwear for your active lifestyle?

I prefer underwear that is made of soft, breathable materials like cotton or moisture-wicking fabric to keep me comfortable during physical activities. A comfortable waistband and a snug fit are also crucial for me to feel secure and supported while on the move. Durability is key, so I look for reinforced stitching and quality construction to ensure the underwear can withstand frequent wear and washing.

Our moisture-wicking underwear is designed with Cool Comfort速 fabric that helps keep you cool no matter what your day brings. Our experts also designed these men's underwear with no-ride-up construction and a Comfort Flex速 waistband that stretches and moves with you. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer on laundry day. We also love how these tagless boxer brief underwear sets are available in multiple color and pack options, so you can choose the one that works best for you."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <ZLYC Mens Long Leg Cotton Boxer Briefs Fit Underwear, 3/4 Pack> / Item ID: B079L3M5NM / Price: $22.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ['This mens boxer briefs will keep you comfortable all day long. Made of 95% premium combed cotton, comfy, breathable, softer and stronger than standard cotton. It has wide elastic waistband that offers a comfortable fit in every situation. Machine wash warm with like colors2. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed.3. Tumble dry medium.4. Cool iron if needed.', 'Satisfaction Guarantee', ': If any problem, please feel free to contact us and we will work hard towards your 100% satisfaction (new replacements or refund)'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Boxer Briefs, Cotton Stretch Moisture-Wicking Underwear, 6-Pack> / Item ID: B0C6JDX8V5 / Price: $24.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from soft and breathable stretch cotton that moves with you, thanks to our Cool Comfort速 fabric. Our experts designed them with a Comfort Flex速 waistband that flexes and moves with you. Each pair of boxer brief underwear has a no-ride-up design, so they'll stay put no matter what your day holds. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer when they need a quick refresh. And our favorite feature part of all? These men's black boxer brief underwear sets have different waistband colors and also come in multiple size options, from Small to extended sizes like 3XL, so you can choose the one that works best for you."]
